effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the holder's Beauty during a Super Contest's Visual Competition.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises the holder's Beauty while in a contest.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせて　コンテストに　参加すると
その　ポケモンは　いつもより
うつくしく　みられる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
During a Contest, it raises the Beauty
aspect of the Pokémon holding it.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Aumenta la “Bellezza” di chi l’indossa
in una Gara.

Reduce la Velocidad. Los Pokémon que levitan y
los de tipo Volador se tornan sensibles a
movimientos de tipo Tierra.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Trainer erhöhen damit in
Wettbewerben die „Schönheit“ ihres Pokémon.

Objet à tenir. Augmente la Beauté d’un Pokémon
dans les Concours.

지니게 하여 콘테스트에 참가하면
그 포켓몬은 여느 때보다
아름답게 보인다.

もたせて　コンテストに　さんかすると
その　ポケモンは　いつもより
うつくしく　みられる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Beauty aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Beauty aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

Objet à tenir. Augmente la Beauté
d’un Pokémon dans les Concours.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the “Beauty” aspect of the
holder in a Contest in Sinnoh.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the “Beauty” aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the “Beauty” aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON’s
BEAUTY condition in CONTESTS.

A hold item that
raises BEAUTY in
CONTESTS.

raises BEAUTY in
